awakenings.effect: Immediately activates Ultimate without cost upon entering battle. After using Ultimate, gain [Umbrella Protection]: Allies' non-Dark resistance increased by 40%, enemy damage reduced by 12.5% (lasts 5 seconds).
[Basic Attack], [Skill], [Ultimate Skill] and [Passive] level and level cap +2.
[Basic Attack], [Skill], [Ultimate Skill] and [Passive] level and level cap +2.
[Umbrella Healing+] The passive effect is added once for the first two activations, and also grants a shield equal to 50% of Jorogumo's maximum HP.

effects: When healing a target with 'Continuous Damage' status, healing is increased by an additional 25%.
If target HP is below 50%, grant continuous healing effect, restoring 9% of caster's ATK as HP per second for 3 seconds, max 1 stack.
memoryCard.name: Beautiful Moon

auto.description: The friendly unit with the lowest current health percentage gains a continuous health regeneration of 20.4% + 440 of its own attack power for 3 seconds; during the continuous regeneration, gain 10% all resistance.
auto.name: Blooming Sweet Rain

normal.description: Deals 120% ATK Chaos Damage to a target enemy.
normal.name: Eclipse Silk

passive.description: After an ally is attacked, if HP is below 30%, consume 1 stack of [Umbrella Flower] to gain 3 rapid heals of 15.1% Max HP within 1 second. The first 2 times gain 6 rapid heals.
passive.name: Umbrella Heal

ultimate.description: After a short casting time, a healing area with a range of 5 is created, restoring the caster's attack power by 46% + 243 HP per second for 5 seconds. Allied characters within the area gain 1 stack of [Umbrella Blossom], up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
ultimate.name: Umbrella Blossom

teamSkill.description: At the start of combat, healing is increased by 5% for every 500 attack power, up to 6 times. Self-generated energy gain efficiency is increased by 10%.
teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
